item.title: mac python valueerror: unknown locale: utf-8
item.description: Mac brew更新软件报locale utf-8 unknown。 问题描述 brew update && brew upgrade，更新 mpv 时报错: ValueError: unknown locale: UTF-8 确定当前locale :::bash $ locale LANG= LC_COLLATE="C" LC_CTYPE="UTF-8" LC_MESSAGES="C" LC_MONETARY="C"
